message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think 60-40 is fair, but you can have the bigger share this time.
You had your chance, now it's my turn again! Considering the inflation, you should be happy with 35%!
I'm still willing to go 60-40. It's a fair split, and it's getting risky to keep rejecting offers.
You're running out of time, Bob! With inflation eating away at your share, you should be grateful for 30%!
I'm willing to take a smaller share this time to avoid further losses from inflation. 35-65 is the best we can do right now.
You're really running out of time now, Bob! With inflation eating away at your share, 25% is a generous offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm accepting your offer. Inflation is too high, and I'd rather get something than nothing.
